pattern.description: The following strings are recognised in the pattern:  - yyyy : the full year, use yy for just the last two digits  - MM   : the month  - dd   : the day of the month  - hh   : the hour of the day (24-hour clock)  - mm   : the minute of the hour  - ss   : seconds  - SSS  : milliseconds (although I'm not sure you'd want to roll your logs every millisecond)  - O    : timezone (capital letter o)
